title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: get up and running with Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma, and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python library for chatting with Ollama models, embeddings, and tool calling.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node and browsers.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration to use Ollama models as LLM, chat, or embeddings endpoints.

title: ollama-webui (formerly Ollama-WebUI)
summary: Feature-rich web interface for Ollama (ChatGPT-style UI, model manager, multi-user).

title: continue
summary: VS Code & JetBrains plugin that adds local AI coding assistant via Ollama.

title: ollama-hyperbolic
summary: Community project exposing Ollama inference through Hyperbolic decentralized GPU market.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal RAG example using Ollama embeddings + Chroma vector DB.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: Turn Ollama models into GitHub Copilot-style VS Code completion provider.

title: ollama-chatbot
summary: Simple Flask/React chatbot template backed by Ollama.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client library for Ollama with Spring Boot starters.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Cross-platform TUI client for Ollama written in Rust.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Self-host Discord bot that answers questions using local Ollama models.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Community-maintained Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes.

title: ollama-gui
summary: Lightweight Electron desktop app for chatting with Ollama.

title: ollama-tools
summary: Collection of community scripts: model conversion, benchmarking, bulk pull.

title: ollama-npm
summary: Official npm package providing JS/TS bindings for the Ollama API.

title: ollama-pypi
summary: Official PyPI package for chatting, embedding, and tool use with Ollama.

title: reddit/r/ollama
summary: Active subreddit for model recommendations, troubleshooting, and showcase projects.

title: ollama on Hacker News
summary: Discussion thread covering performance tips and comparisons with llama.cpp server.
